jobDescription: About Pluto7 and the Role Pluto7 is a Google Partner Specializing in machine learning and artificial industry implementation. We train our employees to become strong data engineer combined with data sciences to apply through machine learning models to solve real world problems in Retail and Supply Chain. The work may be conducted at Google working with Google Engineers or at various locations and remote within US.
